definition: to come out of the closet/to reveal one's sexual orientation

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: After coming out in 2000, he could not get work for several years.
sentences.chinese: 自2000年出柜后，他七年都找不到工作。

sentences.english: Coming out is a confusing time for many people. Accepting your sexuality (or coming out to yourself) can bring about a number of fears.
sentences.chinese: 出柜，对许多人来说，是一段困惑的时期。

sentences.english: Lambert says that he would have officially come out regardless of whether or not the pictures had been made public.
sentences.chinese: 兰伯特说无论有没有照片门事件，他都会正式出柜的。

sentences.english: One girl pronounced herself "out" as casually as if she'd announced the time.
sentences.chinese: 一个女生宣布自己“出柜”就像公布时间那样随便。

sentences.english: The process of telling people about one’s homosexuality is often referred to as coming out.
sentences.chinese: 向周围的人吐露自己的同性恋取向通常称为“出柜”。

sentences.english: I'd like to know more about your thoughts on closeted actors and how serious is this issue.
sentences.chinese: 我想要知道你对不出柜的这些演员有什么想法。

sentences.english: There's also times where the whole closeted problem gets in the way.
sentences.chinese: 有时候也会有出柜的问题阻碍着我们。

sentences.english: You are an openly gay high school football coach?
sentences.chinese: 你是出柜同志，也是橄榄球校队教练吗？

definition: sham marriage, esp. a marriage between a gay man and a lesbian arranged in response to parental expectations of a conventional marriage/abbr. for 形式婚姻
to do the splits (gymnastics)/(Tw) two-timing (in romantic relationships)/Taiwan pr. [pi1 tui3]
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
to get married and have kids/to start a family
marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy
love between an older woman and a younger man
